com.apriori.concurrent

Interface FutureVisitor<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of result value visited
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleFutureVisitor

    public interface FutureVisitor<T>
    Interface for the visitor pattern with ListenableFutures. When a visitor is passed to ListenableFuture.visit(FutureVisitor), the future calls one of these methods, depending on the actual disposition of the future.

    This is particularly handy, when combined with FutureListener.forVisitor(FutureVisitor), for implementing listeners and asynchronously handling futures when they complete.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelled()
      Invoked when the visited future was cancelled.
      void failed(Throwable failure)
      Invoked when the visited future failed.
      static <T> FutureVisitor<T> of(Consumer<? super T> onSuccess, Consumer<? super Throwable> onFailure, Runnable onCancel)
      Assembles a visitor using all of the specified callbacks.
      void successful(T result)
      Invoked when the visited future completed successfully.

    • Method Detail

      • successful

        void successful(T result)
        Invoked when the visited future completed successfully.
        Parameters:
        result - the result of the visited future

      • failed

        void failed(Throwable failure)
        Invoked when the visited future failed.
        Parameters:
        failure - the cause of failure of the visited future

      • cancelled

        void cancelled()
        Invoked when the visited future was cancelled.

      • of

        static <T> FutureVisitor<T> of(Consumer<? super T> onSuccess,
                               Consumer<? super Throwable> onFailure,
                               Runnable onCancel)
        Assembles a visitor using all of the specified callbacks. Which callback is invoked depends on the disposition of the completed futures.
        Parameters:
        onSuccess - invoked when the completed future is successful; the future's result is passed to the consumer
        onFailure - invoked when the completed future has failed; the cause of failure is passed to the consumer
        onCancel - invoked when the completed future is cancelled
        Returns:
        a listener that will call one of the specified callbacks when invoked
        See Also:
        SimpleFutureVisitor.Builder
